info.desc: The beginning of the tunnel to Smith Hall
info.instr: Descend to floor 1, which is below the mall level.

info.desc: The fork in the tunnel to Smith Hall. Continue on the left to the sub-basement of Smith Hall. Take the right path with the stairs to the basement of Smith Hall.
info.instr: The north side of Kolthoff Hall has a tunnel at the east-most corner. Enter it.
Enter the basement of Smith Hall on the right or the sub-basement on the left.
